channel.title: Moparisthebest low rep?
channel.description: i know im not allowed to say rep but has mopar only got 13 rep? because he started at 50 once he changed the rep system

item.title: Moparisthebest low rep?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You’re allowed to say rep, just to let you know…the rule was modified a while back to forbid only asking for rep.

But isn’t it a good indication, then, that people don’t rep him for no reason? He has far more on moparscape forums than on these, which probably indicates that people are a bit more conservative with handing out rep on moparisthebest forums.

I really don’t understand what point you’re trying to make, though.

Read full topic
